# loopia_subdomain (Resource)

Fetches details about a specific subdomain

## Example Usage
```terraform
resource "loopia_subdomain" "something_example_com" {
  subdomain = "something"
  domain    = "example.com"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain` (String) The domain name to create the subdomain for
- `subdomain` (String) The subdomain to create
